h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: She has a particularly damaging attack where she'll extend both front legs far to the sides, and you'll be able to spot a gleam along them before she thrusts both legs together in a pincer strike. Time it right by using Rock Solid when you spot the legs gleam, and you can knock her back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
She has a particularly damaging attack where she'll extend both front legs far to the sides, and you'll be able to spot a gleam along them before she thrusts both legs together in a pincer strike. Time it right by using Rock Solid when you spot the legs gleam, and you can knock her back.
